problem.markdown: A closed system contains an ideal gas. Which of the following is true? [x] The temperature of the gas is dependent on volume of the gas. [x] The temperature of the gas is dependent on pressure of the gas. [x] The temperature (on the Kelvin scale) of the gas is proportional to the product of its pressure and its volume. [ ] The temperature of the gas is proportional to the ratio of its pressure and its volume.
problem.p: A closed system contains an ideal gas. Which of the following is true?

checkboxgroup.choice: The temperature of the gas is dependent on volume of the gas.
The temperature of the gas is dependent on pressure of the gas.
The temperature (on the Kelvin scale) of the gas is proportional to the product of its pressure and its volume.
The temperature of the gas is proportional to the ratio of its pressure and its volume.
